name: From Netherfield to Uppercross Quiz | Literature | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Longbourn.

	Mary is the middle Bennet sister.

Mansfield Park.

	Sir Thomas's lady and Fanny's aunt, she scarcely budges from the sofa.

Mrs. Goddard's school

	Harriet's the 'natural daughter of somebody' wealthy enough to establish her as a 'parlour boarder' at Mrs. Goddard's. Later she marries farmer Robert Martin and I assume she goes to live at Abbey-Mill Farm.

questions.text: Mary Musgrove nee Elliot (after she marries)
questions.explanation:
Uppercross Cottage.

	Mary Elliot lives at Kellynch while she's growing up, but after she marries Charles Musgrove she goes to live at Uppercross Cottage. Her in-laws live in the Great House at Uppercross.

Northanger Abbey.

	The General is Henry, Eleanor, and Captain Tilney's father. Catherine goes to visit the family at Northanger Abbey, but General Tilney kicks her out when he finds out she's not an heiress.

Westgate Buildings, Bath.

	Mrs. Smith is a former school friend of Anne Elliot's. A widowed invalid, she lives in genteel poverty in Westgate Buildings--apparently a low-rent neighborhood, judging by Anne's family's reaction.

Mansfield Parsonage.

	Mrs. Grant, wife of Dr. Grant, supplants Mrs. Norris as mistress of Mansfield Parsonage. Mrs. Norris is shocked at the extravagant dinners Mrs. Grant serves there. However, after the scandal involving her brother Henry and Maria Rushworth (nee Bertram), Mrs. Grant goes to live in London where her husband 'succeeds to a stall in Westminster.'

Kellynch Lodge.

	Lady Russell lives close to Kellynch Hall at Kellynch Lodge. She originally moved there to be close to her dear friend Lady Elliot, and stayed on to help raise her dead friend's three daughters.

questions.text: Elizabeth Darcy (nee Bennet) after her marriage
questions.explanation:
Pemberley.

	Our heroine spends her life ensconced in 'all the comfort and elegance of their family party at Pemberley.'

Randalls.

	After she marries, the former Miss Taylor goes to live with her husband at Randalls.
